hero.breadcrumb: The Hague • Beauty Academy & Beauty Salon
hero.description: Do you want to work in a real salon environment with clients, colours and trends? Sparkle in Style combines a professional Beauty Academy with a modern Beauty Salon — giving you hands-on experience from day one.

highlights.teacherDesc: Trainers with years of real salon experience.
highlights.practicalDesc: Small groups, real models, and client sessions.
highlights.flexibleDesc: Begin at several times throughout the year.

makeup.title: Make-up & Beauty Styling
makeup.desc: From essential techniques to editorial looks, including a professional portfolio day.

hair.title: Hair & Styling
hair.desc: Cutting, blow-drying, and updos, plus salon etiquette and client consultation.

nails.title: Nail Styling
nails.desc: Gel polish, acrylics, and nail care with complete hygiene protocol training.

lash.title: Lash & Brow Styling
lash.desc: Brow shaping, tinting, lamination, and lash lifting to create long-lasting results.

fashion.title: Fashion Styling
fashion.desc: Wardrobe curation, color theory, and styling for shoots, events, and personal branding.

business.title: Beauty Business & Entrepreneurship
business.desc: Build your own brand: pricing, client communication, social media, and beauty business essentials.

support.title: More Than an Academy
support.subtitle: Sparkle in Style supports students beyond training by connecting education, coaching and real work opportunities.

coaching.title: Job Coaching
coaching.desc: We offer work experience placements and job coaching for our students and external participants, in collaboration with employers.

teaching.title: Education & Guidance
teaching.desc: In collaboration with regional secondary schools, students can continue their compulsory education while training with us.

work.title: Work & Employers
work.desc: We work with a broad network of employers offering apprenticeships, internships and practical training opportunities.

signature.title: Signature Cut & Style
signature.desc: Precision cutting tailored to your face shape with a luxury blowout.

balayage.title: Balayage & Gloss
balayage.desc: Hand-painted highlights for a natural, sun-kissed dimension.

manicure.title: Gel Couture Manicure
manicure.desc: Detailed cuticle care, shaping, and long-lasting gel polish.

pedicure.title: Luxury Pedicure
pedicure.desc: Exfoliating scrub, mask, hot stone massage, and polish.

event.title: Event Makeup
event.desc: Long-wearing HD makeup for special occasions.

bridal.title: Bridal Package
bridal.desc: Trial session plus wedding day application.

reviews.quote: I never imagined learning could feel this practical and inspiring at the same time. Working with real clients gave me confidence from day one.
reviews.author: Sara M.

reviews.quote: The trainers truly care about your growth. I learned not only technical skills, but also how to act professionally in a real salon environment.
reviews.author: Nadia K.

reviews.quote: Sparkle in Style helped me find my direction. The combination of education, coaching, and real experience made all the difference for me.
reviews.author: Emily R.

contact.description: Visit us, call us, or send a message — we’re happy to help with academy programs or salon appointments.

quickContact.title: Quick Contact
quickContact.description: Need a quick answer? Reach out to us directly — we’re happy to help.

team.description: The professionals behind Sparkle in Style — carefully selected for quality, discipline and consistent results.

founder.name: Ruby Pracht
founder.paragraph1: Sparkle in Style was created with a clear vision: to build a place where beauty education and professional standards come together without compromise.
founder.paragraph2: Every artist and mentor is selected not only for technical skill, but also for professionalism, discipline and the ability to guide others with confidence and care.

leadMentor.name: Ayondi Rigters
leadMentor.paragraph1: Ayondi combines refined technique with real industry experience, guiding students toward confidence, professionalism and excellence in every detail.
leadMentor.paragraph2: Her mentorship focuses on modern glam, bridal aesthetics and the standards required in high-end beauty environments.

team.closing: Curated team • consistent quality • luxury standards

podcastPage.title: Sparkle in Style Podcast
podcastPage.description: Real stories from our students about growth, self-confidence and chasing their dreams.
podcastPage.featuredCta: Watch this student's story on YouTube.

about.paragraph1: Sparkle in Style is a certified training company that provides high-quality vocational education and social coaching for young people and adults. Students develop essential workplace skills, work on their personal growth, and receive guidance toward employment and active participation in society.
about.spaceText: calm, professional, and designed for both education and client experience.
